issue.title: [Format][C++] Add CSF sparse tensor support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4226](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4226). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2546#pullrequestreview-156064172>
> Perhaps in the future, if zero-copy and future-proof-ness is really what we want, we might want to add the CSF (compressed sparse fiber) format, a generalisation of CSR/CSC. I'm currently working on adding it to PyData/Sparse, and I plan to make it the preferred format (COO will still be around though).
